entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Zakantosh Cardgame

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Zakantosh Cardgame*):

ul.li: Description: A Collectible Single Player Card Battle Game that focuses on Story Content. Your enemies are all kind of creatures, goaded by the evil influence of the mysterious crystals, that appeared out of nowhere. You will need to collect powerful cards and gems to fight your way through Zakantosh.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Broken Bot

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Broken Bots*):

ul.li: Ratings: Steam 64 % (6/10, 14 recommendations) / IGDB Meta 55 % (1 sources)

Description: Bestow double fire rate to your comrade or bastardize your enemy with reverse controls! Broken Bots is arcade style multiplayer robot warfare where players dish out power-ups to teammates & glitches to foes. Customize weapons, passives, & skills then battle it out in Capture The Flag, Team Deathmatch, & King Of The Hill!

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.
